content: You can make LDAP traffic confidential and secure by using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) option in an LDAP connection settings category. It helps users understand that using SSL makes LDAP traffic confidential and secure. This tooltip appears when the user hovers over a checkbox labeled "LdapConnectionTypeSSL".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "istifadə edərək" directly translates to 'using'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly unnatural in Azerbaijani in this context. A more fluent phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) ilə LDAP trafikini şəxsi və təhlükəsiz edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the English abbreviation (SSL) without consistent formatting. While acceptable, standardizing this (e.g., always italicizing or always providing the full name) would improve consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) ilə LDAP trafikini şəxsi və təhlükəsiz edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation includes "(Secure Sockets Layer)". While technically correct, it's redundant since 'SSL' is already explained. Removing this parenthetical phrase would improve readability and conciseness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez rendre le trafic LDAP confidentiel et sécurisé en utilisant le protocole SSL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "보안 소켓 계층(SSL)을 사용하여 LDAP 트래픽을 기밀로 유지하고 보안을 유지할 수 있습니다" is a bit redundant. '기밀로 유지하고 보안을 유지하다' (keep confidential and maintain security) essentially means the same thing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 보안 소켓 계층(SSL)을 사용하여 LDAP 트래픽을 안전하게 보호할 수 있습니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, including the full 'Secure Sockets Layer' name in parentheses alongside the abbreviation SSL is slightly less natural in Korean. It's more common to simply use SSL after it's first introduced.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 보안 소켓 계층(SSL)을 사용하여 LDAP 트래픽을 안전하게 보호할 수 있습니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses "ລັບ" which translates to "secret" or "private" rather than "confidential." While it conveys a similar idea, 'confidential' is more accurate in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດເຮັດໃຫ້ການຈະລາຈອນ LDAP ລັບຄວາມລັບແລະປອດໄພໄດ້ໂດຍການໃຊ້ Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'drošligzdu' is a misspelling of 'drošības'.

The English phrase "You can make LDAP traffic confidential and secure" is better conveyed by focusing on the *possibility* of making traffic secure, rather than a command to 'take care of' it. 'Zadbaj o...' implies a responsibility and action that isn't quite the intention of the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Można uczynić ruch LDAP poufnym i bezpiecznym za pomocą Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Utilizarea protocolului Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) securizează și protejează confidențialitatea procesului de comunicare cu serverul LDAP' is a bit too literal and verbose compared to the English content. It conveys the same meaning but sounds less natural in Romanian. 'Securizează și protejează' is somewhat redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizarea Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) asigură confidențialitatea și securitatea comunicării cu serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using the full 'Secure Sockets Layer' followed by (SSL) is not the typical style. It would be better to use SSL throughout if the abbreviation is already defined.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizarea SSL asigură confidențialitatea și securitatea comunicării cu serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආරක්ෂිත' (arakshita) is a correct translation of 'secure', however, 'ආරක්ෂිත' is more commonly used in a general sense. In this context, 'වියද්ධ' (viyadha) would be more appropriate for 'secure' as it specifically means confidential or private.
The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward. The word order could be changed to be more natural in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආරක්ෂිත සොකට් ස්ථරය (SSL) භාවිතයෙන් ඔබට LDAP ගමනාගමනය වියද්ධ සහ ආරක්ෂිත කළ හැකිය. --> ඔබට ආරක්ෂිත සොකට් ස්ථරය (SSL) භාවිතයෙන් LDAP ගමනාගමනය වියද්ධ සහ ආරක්ෂිත කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'urediš' (you can arrange) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'make...confidential and secure'. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of enabling or implementing SSL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zaupen in varen promet LDAP lahko omogočiš z uporabo Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'Zaupen in varen promet LDAP' reads a bit awkwardly. 'Zaupen in varen LDAP promet' flows better in Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zaupen in varen LDAP promet lahko omogočiš z uporabo Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "учинити" (uchiniti) is overly formal and archaic for this context. It translates to 'to make' but sounds stiff and unnatural in modern Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'možete zaštititi' (you can protect).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете заштитити LDAP саобраћај поверљивим и сигурним коришћењем Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Možete učiniti LDAP saobraćaj poverljivim i sigurnim" is a literal translation and slightly awkward in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the act of securing the traffic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete obezbediti poverljivost i sigurnost LDAP saobraćaja korišćenjem Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Lớp Cổng Bảo Mật' is a literal translation of 'Secure Sockets Layer' and is not commonly used in Vietnamese. It sounds unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use a more natural translation like 'Lớp Mật Mã Ổn Định' or 'SSL' directly, as 'SSL' is frequently used and understood in technical contexts in Vietnam.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, keeping 'SSL' in English within a Vietnamese sentence might feel a bit jarring to some readers. Consider using the Vietnamese term if you opt for that suggestion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If using the Vietnamese translation, ensure consistency throughout the application.
